title: HERBS AND HOMEOPATHY
description: Outline the most common herbal and homeopathic remedies that may be useful to a D.C. who cares for pregnant patients Differentiate between helpful remedies and those contraindicated for use during pregnancy How and when to successfully integrate these palliative therapies to relieve common complaints of pregnancy Recognize the basics of homeopathy, why and how it works, how to
cleaned_text: Description Outline the most common herbal and homeopathic remedies that may be useful to a D.C. who cares for pregnant patients Differentiate between helpful remedies and those contraindicated for use during pregnancy How and when to successfully integrate these palliative therapies to relieve common complaints of pregnancy Recognize the basics of homeopathy, why and how it works, how to administer remedies and proper use and storage of remedies Generalize the use and need for these remedies to accommodate the special needs and concerns of the pregnancy patient Approved In The Following States
